function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implementing effective noise and vibration control measures, including sound insulation and absorption","category":"Environmental impact assessments, sustainable engineering practices","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic diversification, social welfare programs, political stability measures","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Promoting sustainable and eco-friendly disease mitigation measures, reducing reliance on single-use materials, and adopting renewable energy sources","category":"Promote verified information","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Financial support and investment incentives","category":"Financial aid and economic recovery programs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strong data protection regulations and encryption techniques, obtain explicit consent from individuals for data collection","category":"Control of disease transmission, management of wildlife populations","confidence":"Low"}]}
